example.text: The Supreme Court agreed to decide whether the federal Pension Benefit Guaranty Corp. may require [LTV Corp.]-2 PRO-2 to reassume funding responsibility for a $ 2.3 billion shortfall in the company 's pension plans .
example.arg: funding responsibility for a $ 2.3 billion shortfall in the company 's pension plans .
